General Tso's Paleo Chicken

A healthier version of a Chinese takeout favorite. Chicken breast gets a crunchy coating and is finished with a sweet and spicy glaze made with coconut aminos, chili paste, ginger, honey, and garlic. Served with crisp, saut√©ed snow peas and broccoli rabe.

$11.95

Item added to cart



SLIMGFDFPALEO

Ingredients 

Chicken, Broccoli Rabe, Snow Peas, Egg, Almond Flour, Tapioca Flour, Coconut Aminos, Chili Paste, Chili Flake, Garlic, Ginger, Olive Oil, Honey, Salt, Pepper

Nutritional Info

Calories M: 425 / L: 615
Protein M: 46g / L: 69g
Fat M: 15g / L: 22g
Carbs M: 23g / L: 34g

Why do I need to create an account?

We need to determine your delivery address and whether you want delivery to your home, office or gym.

How it works

  • Add meals to your cart
  • Upon checkout, select delivery dates for your meals
  • There is a $10 minimum on your total order
  • All Meals must be ordered 4-5 days prior, so we have time to source the freshest possible ingredients
  • Contact us if you have questions or feedback. We like hearing from you! ([email protected])
